org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client

类 ClusterStatusListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.ClusterStatusListener
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
class ClusterStatusListener
extends Object
implements Closeable
    A class that receives the cluster status, and provide it as a set of service to the client. Today, manages only the dead server list. The class is abstract to allow multiple implementations, from ZooKeeper to multicast based.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  ClusterStatusListener.DeadServerHandler
      Class to be extended to manage a new dead server.
      (专用程序包) static interface  ClusterStatusListener.Listener
      The interface to be implemented by a listener of a cluster status event.
      (专用程序包) class  ClusterStatusListener.MulticastListener
      An implementation using a multicast message between the master & the client.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      private List<ServerName> deadServers 
      static Class<? extends ClusterStatusListener.Listener> DEFAULT_STATUS_LISTENER_CLASS 
      private ClusterStatusListener.Listener listener 
      private static org.slf4j.Logger LOG 
      static String STATUS_LISTENER_CLASS
      The implementation class to use to read the status.

      • isDeadServer

        public boolean isDeadServer(ServerName sn)
        Check if we know if a server is dead.
        参数:
        sn - the server name to check.
        返回:
        true if we know for sure that the server is dead, false otherwise.
